name: Cat Run (itch) (PirateFoxBox)
description:
Im making a cat runner game as part of my learning experience :)

My code looks like a mess :D

all art is made by me too.

if you have any feedback or suggestions I would love to hear :3

Ver 1.7 Fixed:
1. Fixed bug where the platforms stop generating.
2. Fixed overall gravity bug where gravity data would keep after a restart
3. infinite background in endless mode

Ver 1.8.1:
1. Added a new Power up to endless mode which turns the game into a flappy bird type control when picked up (green square) and resets back when picking up the reset power up (pink square)
2. added a draft for the Endless mode button.
3. game now follows your score based on:
a. Normal mode - coins, cats saved, distance (score).
b. Endless mode - coins, cats *collected so far*, distance (score).
4. and in order to accommodate the new power up I also change the level layout a tiny bit to give "room to breath" so you wont die too fast when picking those up.

Ver 1.8.2:
adjusted back border speed to be slightly slower than the player

Ver 1.8.3
Added doors that need several cats in order to push open
